item.title: I have a couple small problems if you don't mind :)
item.dc:creator: @jal_knight jal knight
item.description:
@jal_knight wrote:

First one;
I’ve searched everywhere for PI ::vote4cash tuts. I have the vote command that takes the player to the voting page, they can vote BUT the gift that they get doesn’t go to them. Or maybe there is supposed to be a command? I’m not sure, but I would like to hear some input on that if you guys could.

Second one;
I’ve also searched everywhere for the new bank look. Is there anyway someone could point me to a tut for this? The ones I’ve found are for 562 + but none for PI :(.

I really appreciate any feed back I can get from anyone, thanks!

Read full topic
item.source: I have a couple small problems if you don't mind :)
